alert.note: Alert for Barrow; Gwinnett; Hall; Jackson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 2:27PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Barrow, northeastern Gwinnett, southeastern Hall and northwestern Jackson Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 227 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Road Atlanta-Lanier Speedway, or 10 miles south of Gainesville, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Jefferson, Buford, Braselton, Flowery Branch, Oakwood, Hoschton, Pendergrass, Talmo, Rest Haven, Candler, Thompsons Mill, Chateau Elan, Chestnut Mountain, and Road Atlanta-Lanier Speedway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
